title: Back to the movies?
description:
As we inch closer towards a post-pandemic world, will everyone go back to watching movies in theaters? Vox film critic Alissa Wilkinson talks with Peter Kafka about her observations and predictions as movie theaters start to open back up.
References: 

Listen and subscribe to Recode Media with Peter Kafka

Listen and subscribe to What to Watch with Alissa Wilkinson

Read Alissa’s review of Nomadland. 


Read Alissa’s review of Godzilla vs. Kong
